column4: I have used system>administration>usb startup disk creator to copy the 10.04 iso to my usb drive.  Is there a way to edit it to include other programs like antivirus?  I had to use the usb drive to recover my mother's windows computer from a virus, but there was no antivirus included in the livecd.
boot the usb, then add packages.
not sure i understand.  I added wifi drivers to my live usb and it retained them...
